input.sentences: the tropical island was a wonderful place for the two friends to vacation .
the two friends posed in front of the beach .
long staircases led tourists down to the beach .
in addition to the beach | many people had shops set up and were selling their wares .
at the end of the day | one friend enjoyed a tropical drink .
output.sentences: My friend and I went exploring.
We ate and drank the local food.
